headline.main: ALLIED RAIDERS HIT 30 PLANES AT LAE; Salamaua Also Attacked and Three Enemy Fighters Are Downed With Small Loss FOE BOMBS HORN ISLAND Blamey Says Japanese Are Threatening Both Darwin and Port Moresby

lead_paragraph: MELBOURNE, Australia, May 1 -- For the second successive day the United Nations Air Force yesterday bombed and machine-gunned the Japanese base at Lae and scored many hits on a line of thirty planes. The official communique said it was a brilliant and heavy attack that started many large fires in the target area.
abstract: Allied fliers raid Lae and Salamaua
